member.name: P:Insql.IInsqlBuilder.Services
member.summary: Gets the where Insql Providers services are configured.

member.name: P:Insql.IInsqlMapperBuilder.Services
member.summary: Gets the where Insql Providers services are configured.

member.name: T:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions
member.summary: Contains options that control how Minimatch matches strings.

member.name: P:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions.NoComment
member.summary: Suppresses the behavior of treating # at the start of a pattern as a comment.

member.name: P:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions.NoNegate
member.summary: Suppresses the behavior of treating a leading ! character as negation.

member.name: P:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions.NoBrace
member.summary: Do not expand {a,b} and {1.3} brace sets.

member.name: P:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions.NoGlobStar
member.summary: Disable ** matching against multiple folder names.

member.name: P:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions.NoCase
member.summary: Ignores case differences when matching.

member.name: P:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions.NoExt
member.summary: Disable "extglob" style patterns like +(a|b).

member.name: P:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions.Dot
member.summary: Allow patterns to match filenames starting with a period, even if the pattern does not explicitly have a period in that spot. Note that by default, a/**/b will not match a/.d/b, unless dot is set.

member.name: P:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions.NoNull
member.summary: When a match is not found by Match(), return a list containing the pattern itself. If not set, an empty list is returned if there are no matches.

member.name: P:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions.FlipNegate
member.summary: Returns from negate expressions the same as if they were not negated. (ie, true on a hit, false on a miss).

member.name: P:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions.MatchBase
member.summary: If set, then patterns without slashes will be matched against the basename of the path if it contains slashes. For example, a?b would match the path /xyz/123/acb, but not /xyz/acb/123.

member.name: P:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions.AllowWindowsPaths
member.summary: If true, backslahes in patterns and paths will be treated as forward slashes. This disables escape characters.

member.name: P:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions.IgnoreCase
member.summary: Ignores case differences when matching. This is the same as NoCase.

member.name: T:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcher
member.summary: Parses a single glob pattern and tests strings against it.

member.name: M:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcher.CreateFilter(System.String,Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions)
member.summary: Creates a filter function that tests input against a pattern.

member.name: M:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcher.Check(System.String,System.String,Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions)
member.summary: Tests a single input against a pattern.
member.remarks: This function reparses this input on each invocation. For performance, avoid this function and reuse a Minimatcher instance instead.

member.name: M:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcher.Filter(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String},System.String,Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions)
member.summary: Filters a list of inputs against a single pattern.
member.remarks: This function reparses this input on each invocation. For performance, avoid this function and reuse a Minimatcher instance instead.

member.name: M:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcher.CreateRegex(System.String,Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions)
member.summary: Compiles a pattern into a single regular expression.

member.name: M:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcher.#ctor(System.String,Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions)
member.summary: Creates a new Minimatcher instance, parsing the pattern into a regex.

member.name: M:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcher.IsMatch(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether a given string matches this pattern.

member.name: M:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcher.Filter(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Filters a list of inputs against this pattern.

member.name: M:Insql.Providers.GlobMatcher.BraceExpand(System.String,Insql.Providers.GlobMatcherOptions)
member.summary: Expands all brace ranges in a pattern, returning a sequence containing every possible combination.

member.name: P:Insql.IInsqlProviderBuilder.Services
member.summary: Gets the where Insql Providers services are configured.

member.name: T:Insql.Resolvers.Elements.SetSectionElement
member.summary: set 元素只会在至少有一个子元素的条件返回 SQL 子句的情况下才去插入“SET”子句。而且，若语句的结尾为“,”，set 元素也会将它们去除。

member.name: T:Insql.Resolvers.Elements.WhereSectionElement
member.summary: where 元素只会在至少有一个子元素的条件返回 SQL 子句的情况下才去插入“WHERE”子句。而且，若语句的开头为“AND”或“OR”，where 元素也会将它们去除。

member.name: P:Insql.IInsqlResolverBuilder.Services
member.summary: Gets the where Insql Providers services are configured.
